当前版本：2.49.0.68 这套自定义瞄具原作者是醉饭 由于长时间没有更新 本人只是帮忙更新一下并对其优化 。【这套瞄具的制作经过原作者同意】 由于新版本部分顶级载具的瞄具刻度尺有所改变 我也作出了一定部分的优化。【如果有任何问题可以向我反馈 邮箱:1745097470@qq.com】 此瞄具严禁用于任何商业用途 转载请说明出处 祝各位游戏愉快.

Current version: 2.49.0.68 the original author of this set of custom sight is Zui fan. I just help update and optimize it because I haven't updated it for a long time. [the production of this set of sight is approved by the original author] as the sight scales of some top vehicles in the new version have changed, I have also made some optimization. [if you have any questions, please contact me at: 1745097470@qq.co...

No. 22
Description: My own personal take on the historical Sherman Firefly 6.0x optic and the vanilla Ariete MBT sight found in game.

Bonus Drawing: Album cover of The Trooper and band logo by English heavy metal band Iron Maiden, 1983. requested by @typicalpilot2311. (You'll take my life, but I'll take yours too!!)

Best Used: Universally; the MBT Ariete sight best for high-top tier tanks and the UK universal sight ...
Alisa Mikhailovna Kujou #anime #roshidere #alya

Atago from Azur Lane, as requested by @General Atago
This one was pretty fun to make although i'm not sure if i can post the original image. Won't provide other images just in case.


As always. feel free to comment suggestions on what to do next, i will most likely do them. Do specify if you want it safer or on the lewder end.
